message.body: hi Lindsey! I'm wondering: do u have a baseball bat or softball bat I could borrow?
Shahin! I don't have either of those things but I appreciate your thinking of me as sporty.
more like I thought you'd be someone to smash things with a baseball bat for filmmaking purposes
(which is what I need it for)
Ahahaha! Amazing. Im in the woods of vermont til the 20th!
cool! :) enjoy and rock on with your prep!
Awesome thanks dude good luck shooting!
